TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TemplateVisualStateAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TemplateVisualStateAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TemplateVisualStateAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定控件可处于特定状态，并且 应该位于该控件的 中。

span.span: Specifies that a control can be in a certain state and that a is expected in the control's .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件创作者使用此属性可指定并属于其控件中的对象。Control authors use this attribute to specify the and objects that belong in their control's . 例如，假设您创建具有两个名为的可视状态的新控件`Focused`并`Unfocused`，它们都位于名为`FocusStates`。For example, suppose that you create a new control that has two visual states named `Focused` and `Unfocused`, both of which are in a named `FocusStates`. 若要指定要作者可以使用这些视觉状态，可将添加两个向类的签名控件的属性。To specify to authors that they can use those visual states, add two attributes to the class signature of the control. 指定的属性是`FocusStates`并且属性是`Focused`一个和`Unfocused`其他。Specify that the property is `FocusStates` and that the property is `Focused` for one and `Unfocused` for the other. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了类签名`NumericUpDown`控件。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 此示例指定`NumericUpDown`控件使用四个可视状态。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 两种状态，名为`Positive`并`Negative`，位于名为`ValueStates`。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 其他两个状态，命名`Focused`并`Unfocused`，位于名为`FocusedStates`。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 有关完整示例，请参阅[创建控件，具有可自定义外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应于属性的对象。The property corresponds to the property of a object. 若要指定的内容所属中，设置属性。To specify what a belongs in, set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了类签名`NumericUpDown`控件。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 此示例指定`NumericUpDown`控件使用四个可视状态。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 两种状态，名为`Positive`并`Negative`，位于名为`ValueStates`。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 其他两个状态，命名`Focused`并`Unfocused`，位于名为`FocusedStates`。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 有关完整示例，请参阅[创建控件，具有可自定义外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应于属性的。The property corresponds to the property of a . 若要指定的内容在控件的所属，将属性。To specify what belongs in a control's , set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了类签名`NumericUpDown`控件。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 此示例指定`NumericUpDown`控件使用四个可视状态。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 两种状态，名为`Positive`并`Negative`，位于名为`ValueStates`。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 其他两个状态，命名`Focused`并`Unfocused`，位于名为`FocusedStates`。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 有关完整示例，请参阅[创建控件，具有可自定义外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md).
